publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3095 Stewart Stevenson: Congratulations to Fraserburgh Football Club on Winning the Press and Journal Highland League Titleâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Fraserburgh Football Club on its winning of the Press and Journal Highland League title; notes that this achievement was last accomplished by the club 64 years ago; further notes the dedication and enthusiasm of all players and team staff; believes that the team and its travelling fans are a credit to the local community, and wishes the team all the very best for future football seasons.

S1M-3095 Stewart Stevenson: Congratulations to Fraserburgh Football Club on Winning the Press and Journal Highland League Title-That the Parliament congratulates Fraserburgh Football Club on its winning of the Press and Journal Highland League title; notes that this achievement was last accomplished by the club 64 years ago; further notes the dedication and enthusiasm of all players and team staff; believes that the team and its travelling fans are a credit to the local community, and wishes the team all the very best for future football seasons.

S1M-3095 Congratulations to Fraserburgh Football Club on Winning the Press and Journal Highland League Title (lodged on 9 May 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Shona Robison*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Russell*
S1M-3095 Congratulations to Fraserburgh Football Club on Winning the Press and Journal Highland League Title (lodged on 9 May 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
